# Winmax Gulf - Smart Glass & LED Display Solutions

> Winmax Gulf is a leading provider of PDLC smart glass, LED display solutions, and DJ club entertainment systems in the UAE and GCC region. With 500+ successful installations across Dubai, Abu Dhabi, and the wider Middle East, we deliver cutting-edge visual technology for commercial, residential, and entertainment spaces.

## Core Products & Services

### 1. PDLC Smart Glass / Smart Film

**What is PDLC?**
PDLC (Polymer Dispersed Liquid Crystal) Smart Film is an advanced glass technology that allows instant control over glass transparency. When power is applied, the glass becomes fully transparent. When power is off, the glass becomes milky white opaque, providing complete privacy.

**Technical Specifications:**
- Operating Voltage: 65V AC
- Power Consumption: 5W per square meter
- Switching Speed: Less than 100 milliseconds
- UV Blocking: Up to 99%
- Light Transmission: 75% (transparent mode)
- Haze Level: Less than 4% (transparent mode)
- Operating Temperature: -20°C to +60°C
- Lifespan: 50,000+ switching cycles

**Control Methods:**
- Motion Sensors (automatic activation)
- Smartphone Apps (iOS/Android)
- Remote Controls
- Dimmer Switches
- WiFi Wall Switches
- Voice Assistants (Alexa, Google Home, Siri)
- Crestron & Lutron Integration
- Building Management Systems (BMS)

**Applications:**
- Conference Rooms & Meeting Spaces
- Hospital Patient Rooms
- Hotel Bathrooms & Suites
- Residential Bedrooms & Bathrooms
- Retail Display Windows
- Office Partitions
- Shower Enclosures
- Skylights & Atriums

**Benefits:**
- Instant privacy on demand
- Energy efficient (reduces AC costs)
- Blocks harmful UV rays
- Improves sound insulation
- Low maintenance
- Modern aesthetic appeal
- Can be retrofitted to existing glass

**Pricing:** Custom quotes based on size and specifications. Contact for free site assessment.

### 2. LED Display Systems

**Product Categories:**

**Large Outdoor LED Screens**
- Brightness: Up to 6000 nits
- Pixel Pitch: P4, P5, P6, P8, P10
- IP Rating: IP65/IP66 (weather resistant)
- Applications: Highway billboards, stadium displays, building facades

**Indoor LED Video Walls**
- Brightness: 600-1200 nits
- Pixel Pitch: P1.2, P1.5, P1.8, P2.5, P3, P4
- Resolution: Up to 4K and beyond
- Applications: Shopping malls, corporate lobbies, control rooms

**Flexible LED Screens**
- Bendable and curved configurations
- Custom shapes and installations
- Applications: Curved walls, cylindrical displays, creative installations

**Transparent LED Displays**
- See-through technology
- High transparency rate (60-90%)
- Applications: Store windows, glass facades, showrooms

**Fine Pitch LED (COB Technology)**
- Pixel Pitch: P0.9, P1.2, P1.5
- Ultra-close viewing distance
- Applications: Broadcast studios, premium venues, control rooms

**Rental LED Screens**
- Quick assembly/disassembly
- Portable design
- Applications: Concerts, trade shows, conferences

**Technical Features:**
- Ultra HD 4K+ Resolution
- High Brightness (up to 6000 nits)
- Wide Viewing Angles (160°)
- Weather Resistant IP65 Rating
- HDR10 Support
- Low Power Consumption
- Remote Content Management
- 24/7 Operation Capability

**Quality Standards:**
- ISO9001 Quality Management System
- CE, FCC, RoHS Certified
- 3-year warranty included
- 24/7 remote technical support

- Moving head fixtures
- LED wash lights

- Brands: Martin, Chauvet, Robe, Claypaky

**Visual Effects**
- LED video walls
- Projection mapping
- Holographic displays

**Special Effects**
- CO2 cannons
- Confetti machines
- Fog & haze machines
- Flame effects
- Pyrotechnics (licensed)

**DJ Equipment**
- Pioneer DJ CDJ systems
- Mixer consoles
- Turntables
- MIDI controllers
- Custom DJ booth fabrication

**Rigging & Installation**
- Professional rigging systems
- Truss structures
- Motorized hoists
- Load calculations
- Safety certifications

**Venue Types:**
- Nightclubs
- Bars & Lounges

- Restaurants
- Hotels
- Private Residences

**Project Approach:**
1. Consultation & Design (3D visualization)
2. Equipment Selection (budget optimization)
3. Installation & Setup (certified technicians)
4. Testing & Handover (staff training included)

## Frequently Asked Questions

### PDLC Smart Glass FAQ

**Q: How long does PDLC smart film last?**
A: PDLC smart film has a lifespan of 50,000+ switching cycles, which typically translates to 10-15 years of normal use.

**Q: Can PDLC be applied to existing glass?**
A: Yes, PDLC smart film can be retrofitted to existing glass surfaces. We also offer complete smart glass panels with the film pre-laminated.

**Q: What is the power consumption?**
A: PDLC smart film consumes approximately 5 watts per square meter when in transparent mode. When opaque (power off), it uses zero electricity.

**Q: Does smart glass block UV rays?**
A: Yes, our PDLC smart film blocks up to 99% of harmful UV rays, protecting interiors from fading and reducing heat gain.

**Q: Can I control smart glass with my phone?**
A: Yes, our smart glass can be integrated with smartphone apps, allowing remote control from anywhere in the world.

**Q: Is smart glass suitable for wet areas like bathrooms?**
A: Yes, our smart glass is suitable for bathroom applications including shower enclosures when properly sealed.

### LED Display FAQ

**Q: What is pixel pitch and how do I choose?**
A: Pixel pitch is the distance between LED pixels. Smaller pitch = higher resolution. For close viewing (under 3 meters), choose P1.5-P2.5. For outdoor advertising, P4-P10 is suitable.

**Q: Are LED displays weatherproof?**
A: Our outdoor LED displays are IP65/IP66 rated, meaning they are fully protected against dust and water jets. They operate in temperatures from -20°C to +50°C.

**Q: How bright are LED displays?**
A: Indoor displays typically range from 600-1200 nits. Outdoor displays can reach 6000+ nits for visibility in direct sunlight.

**Q: What content formats are supported?**
A: Our LED displays support all major video formats including MP4, AVI, MOV, as well as images (JPG, PNG, GIF) and live feeds (HDMI, SDI).

**Q: How long do LED displays last?**
A: With proper use, LED displays have a lifespan of 100,000+ hours (approximately 11 years of continuous operation).

**Q: Do you provide content management systems?**
A: Yes, we provide cloud-based content management systems that allow you to schedule and update content remotely.

### DJ Club Solutions FAQ

**Q: Do you handle the complete project from design to installation?**
A: Yes, we provide turnkey solutions including consultation, 3D design visualization, equipment procurement, installation, testing, and ongoing support.

**Q: What brands do you work with?**
A: We partner with leading global brands including Pioneer DJ, JBL, Martin, Chauvet, Robe, d&b audiotechnik, and more.

**Q: Do you provide maintenance services?**
A: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance contracts and 24/7 technical support for all our installations.

**Q: Can you work with existing equipment?**
A: Yes, we can integrate new systems with existing equipment or upgrade specific components based on your needs.

**Q: How long does a typical club installation take?**
A: Depending on the scope, installations can range from 2-8 weeks. We work around your schedule to minimize disruption.

## Installation Process

### Step 1: Consultation
- Free site visit and assessment
- Understanding your requirements
- Budget discussion
- Timeline planning

### Step 2: Design
- 3D visualization
- Technical drawings
- Equipment specifications
- Proposal presentation

### Step 3: Approval & Procurement
- Final design approval
- Equipment ordering
- Project scheduling
- Payment milestones

### Step 4: Installation
- Site preparation
- Professional installation
- Wiring and integration
- System programming

### Step 5: Testing & Handover
- Full system testing
- User training
- Documentation handover
- Warranty activation

### Step 6: Ongoing Support
- Maintenance services
- Technical support
- Upgrades and expansions
- Spare parts availability
